name: A Shadows Tale
description:
Once, after a devastating war, you were locked up in a magical prison.
After sleeping for thousands of years you are finally free, but that is just the beginning of your story, as you are the first of the awakened and it is your time to plunge the world into darkness and take revenge on those who once betrayed you.

Go on an adventure through a magical fairy-tale land. Follow your destiny, while facing new challenges in each of the four unique biomes and become stronger along the way.
Now what are you waiting for? - Find the heart of this world, plunge it into darkness and get your home back!


Mac version comming soon!
